title: so much laagg this patch?
body:
this patch and 5.4 have made it almost imposable for me to play. 
Every time sona spell casts i get a massive fps drop, lanning against one sure is fun :^)
and the lag, the fucking lag, its not supper high but this with all the package loss that has only came about with patch 5.4 and 5.5 makes the game basically unplayable. 

And before you ask yes my net is fine, 10 mb download speed and 30 ping on the speed test. and my graphics card is a gtx 770 2gb, should not have any problems whatsoever with LoL.

replies.body: Been lagging for a few weeks now. It seems to be getting worse I'm getting frequent spikes to 500-800+ ping now, making it very hard to play. Also having weird FPS drops. I shouldn't be having any since I can run up to 250+ FPS uncapped.

Yeah its the FPS drop here!!!1

bloody annoying... been trying to trouble shoot with different champs and scenarios.... strangely enough Bots only has a few FPs issues where as normals have 40+ drops per game... even spectate has FPS issues that dont repeat when you rewind and watch the laggy area.....

Bumps don't work on the boards.

There was a bug in the past which made Sona cause huge frame lag when she cast her Q ability for the first time in the game. Since they recently reverted her stats in a patch. This could be that, which Riot will hopefully fix again.
